name: RUSH (itch) (PARZIVAL477900)
description:
RUSH is a exciting little  platformer game made for fun. I made it as a novice and I would really appreciate that you drop your comments so that I can make some improvements for future games.  The game isn't easy and would take time to complete so comment how long it took you to finish the game and finally please support by donating. 

Also the left an right arrows are used to control the direction of the ball.
